name: Mystery Case Files: Return to Ravenhearst™
description: Emma`s soul is free. But her ghost has delivered a dire warning: evil still lurks in Ravenhearst Manor. Big Fish Games Studios takes you deep inside the cursed estate in Mystery Case Files: Return to Ravenhearst™, the thrilling sequel.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista Processor: 800 Mhz or better Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX®: 7.0 Hard Drive: 347 MB of free space

reviews.review_text: Sick Game me and the misses played it and had a great time
